languages.text: "Так или иначе... маршрут оказался утерян, и все сведения сгинули при нападении на корабль вместе со старым Навигатором. Но теперь у нас есть новая зацепка — данные, что мы собрали в капище культистов на Футфоле. Что бы там ни нес казненный нами мерзавец — должен быть способ их отследить. Скажите мне, Вольный Торговец... вы поможете мне в этом? Поможете найти великую святыню и вернуть ее людям Империума?"

traits.locale_text: "Так или иначе... маршрут оказался утерян, и все сведения сгинули при нападении на корабль вместе со старым Навигатором. Но теперь у нас есть новая зацепка — данные, что мы собрали в капище культистов на Футфоле. Что бы там ни нес казненный нами мерзавец — должен быть способ их отследить. Скажите мне, Вольный Торговец... вы поможете мне в этом? Поможете найти великую святыню и вернуть ее людям Империума?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Так или иначе... маршрут оказался утерян, и все сведения сгинули при нападении на корабль вместе со старым Навигатором. languages.text: “但不管怎么说……那条航线已经遗失了。飞船遭到袭击的时候，所有关于那边的情报，都与那位老导航者一同泯灭了。不过现在，我们找到了新的线索，我们在落脚港的邪教神殿中找到了情报。我不在乎那个被我们处决的异端分子怎么说，我们一定有办法找到他们。告诉我，行商浪人……你愿意帮助我完成这个任务吗？你愿意帮助我找到这件伟大的圣物，把它归还给帝国的人民吗？”
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “但不管怎么说……那条航线已经遗失了。飞船遭到袭击的时候，所有关于那边的情报，都与那位老导航者一同泯灭了。不过现在，我们找到了新的线索，我们在落脚港的邪教神殿中找到了情报。我不在乎那个被我们处决的异端分子怎么说，我们一定有办法找到他们。告诉我，行商浪人……你愿意帮助我完成这个任务吗？你愿意帮助我找到这件伟大的圣物，把它归还给帝国的人民吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «En cualquier caso... la ruta se perdió y todo el conocimiento relacionado con ella murió en el ataque a la nave junto al anterior navegante. Pero ahora tenemos una nueva pista: los datos que recuperamos en el santuario del Culto en Paso. No me importa lo que dijera el réprobo al que ejecutamos, debe de haber una forma de rastrearlos. Conteste, Comerciante Independiente... ¿me ayudará en esta empresa? ¿Me acompañará a la hora de recuperar esta gran reliquia y devolverla a la gente del Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso... la ruta se perdió y todo el conocimiento relacionado con ella murió en el ataque a la nave junto al anterior navegante. Pero ahora tenemos una nueva pista: los datos que recuperamos en el santuario del Culto en Paso. No me importa lo que dijera el réprobo al que ejecutamos, debe de haber una forma de rastrearlos. Conteste, Comerciante Independiente... ¿me ayudará en esta empresa? ¿Me acompañará a la hora de recuperar esta gran reliquia y devolverla a la gente del Imperium?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ…航路は失われ、その航路に関する知識は、かつての航宙士とともに船への攻撃ですべて失われました。だが、我々には今、新たな手がかりがある…フットフォールの教団の神殿で集めたデータだ。処刑した不道徳者が何と言おうと気にすることはありません…彼らを追跡する方法があるはずだ。答えてください、自由開拓者…この仕事を手伝ってはいただけませんか？この偉大な遺物を見つけて、帝国の人々の手に返すのに協力していただけないだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ…航路は失われ、その航路に関する知識は、かつての航宙士とともに船への攻撃ですべて失われました。だが、我々には今、新たな手がかりがある…フットフォールの教団の神殿で集めたデータだ。処刑した不道徳者が何と言おうと気にすることはありません…彼らを追跡する方法があるはずだ。答えてください、自由開拓者…この仕事を手伝ってはいただけませんか？この偉大な遺物を見つけて、帝国の人々の手に返すのに協力していただけないだろうか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie auch immer ... die Route war verloren, und alles Wissen darüber starb zusammen mit dem alten Navigator bei dem Angriff auf das Schiff. Aber jetzt haben wir eine neue Spur – die Daten aus dem Kultistenschrein auf Footfall. Ganz gleich, was der Schurke gesagt hat, den wir hingerichtet haben – es muss einen Weg geben, sie zu finden. Sagt mir, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... werdet Ihr mir bei diesem Vorhaben helfen? Werdet Ihr mir helfen, dieses wichtige Relikt zu finden und den Menschen des Imperiums zurückzugeben?"
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie auch immer ... die Route war verloren, und alles Wissen darüber starb zusammen mit dem alten Navigator bei dem Angriff auf das Schiff. Aber jetzt haben wir eine neue Spur – die Daten aus dem Kultistenschrein auf Footfall. Ganz gleich, was der Schurke gesagt hat, den wir hingerichtet haben – es muss einen Weg geben, sie zu finden. Sagt mir, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... werdet Ihr mir bei diesem Vorhaben helfen? Werdet Ihr mir helfen, dieses wichtige Relikt zu finden und den Menschen des Imperiums zurückzugeben?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Bref... la route a disparu, de même que toute information à son sujet lorsque l'ancien navigateur a péri dans l'attaque du vaisseau. Cependant, nous avons maintenant une nouvelle piste grâce aux données dans le temple des cultistes à Castel. Je refuse de croire ce réprouvé que nous avons exécuté, il y a forcément un moyen de retrouver leur trace. Dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... voulez-vous bien vous joindre à moi dans cette entreprise ? M'aiderez-vous à trouver cette précieuse relique et à la restituer au peuple de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Bref... la route a disparu, de même que toute information à son sujet lorsque l'ancien navigateur a péri dans l'attaque du vaisseau. Cependant, nous avons maintenant une nouvelle piste grâce aux données dans le temple des cultistes à Castel. Je refuse de croire ce réprouvé que nous avons exécuté, il y a forcément un moyen de retrouver leur trace. Dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... voulez-vous bien vous joindre à moi dans cette entreprise ? M'aiderez-vous à trouver cette précieuse relique et à la restituer au peuple de l'Imperium ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Olan olmuştu... Yol yitip gitmişti. Yola dair tüm bilgiler de gemideki saldırıda hayatını yitiren eski Rotacı'yla birlikte hiçliğe karıştı. Şimdiyse elimizde yeni bir ipucu var. Binliman'daki tarikatçı ininden topladığımız verileri kullanabiliriz. İdam ettiğimiz serserinin ne dediği zerre umurumda değil. İzlerini sürmenin bir yolu olmalı. Söyle bana Hür Tacir... Bu girişimde bana destek olacak mısın? Bu eşsiz yadigârı bulup İmparatorluk'un insanlarına geri kazandırmama yardım edecek misin?"
languages.original_text: "In any event... the route was lost, and all knowledge of it died in the attack on the ship along with the old Navigator. But now we have a new lead — the data that we collected in the cultist shrine on Footfall. I don't care what that reprobate we executed said — there must be a way to track them down. Tell me, Rogue Trader... will you help me in this undertaking? Will you help me find this great relic and return it to the people of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Olan olmuştu… Yol yitip gitmişti. Yola dair tüm bilgiler de gemideki saldırıda hayatını yitiren eski Rotacı'yla birlikte hiçliğe karıştı. Ancak elimizde yeni bir ipucu var. Binliman'daki tarikatçı ininden topladığımız verileri kullanabiliriz. İdam ettiğimiz serserinin ne dediği, zerre umurumda değil. Onları takip etmemizin bir yolu olmalı. Söyle bana Hür Tacir… Bu girişimde bana destek olacak mısın? Bu eşsiz yadigârı bulup İmparatorluk'un insanlarına geri kazandırmama yardım edecek misin?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
